response.overview: A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.
response.tagline: What happens when the numbers run out?
response.title: Knowing

titles.title: รหัสวินาศโลก
